mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,n.* from (select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_writer as boardWriter, readcount as readCount, reg_date as regDate, filename, filepath from board where boardtype=#{boardType} order by board_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from board where boardtype=#{boardType}
